book.synopsis: In the famed novel set against the backdrop of medieval Paris, Quasimodo, the hunchbacked bellringer of Notre-Dame Cathedral, struggles to save the beautiful gypsy dancer Esmeralda from being unjustly executed. Reissue.
book.dimensions: Height: 6.88 Inches, Length: 4.32 Inches, Weight: 0.5 Pounds, Width: 0.86 Inches
